message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $12,000 to us. Considering its worth to you would be $8,000, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it offers a significant savings compared to its retail value while securing a high-quality product tailored to your needs. I look forward to your consideration.
